summary: Website UI refinement focusing on hero section visuals (real-life community collaboration image, overlay/typography/button polish) and adding extensible hooks so the chatbot 'secretary' can deep-link/direct users to specific pages and features.
architectural_notes: Introduce a standardized routing/deep-link registry (hooks) that maps chatbot intents/actions to site pages/features for current and future extensibility.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Improve photorealism/clarity and better convey collaboration + efficiency; adjust exposure/contrast for visibility (whisper-hero-community-real.dim_1600x900.png > whisper-hero-community-real-v2.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Update the homepage hero background to use a real-life (photorealistic) image that clearly conveys community collaboration and efficiency, and ensure the hero section uses the updated asset.

Refine the hero overlay and overall hero tone so the hero image remains visibly recognizable while maintaining strong text readability (adjust gradient colors/opacities and/or add subtle image treatment if needed).

Apply the listed UI refinements across the hero and key interactive elements: hero headline contrast/pop, hero spacing/layout, and CTA button polish (hover, shadows, borders) while staying consistent with the existing style system.
Refine the Secretary widget and related UI for readability and hierarchy: background/blur level, assistant/user bubble contrast, and typographic hierarchy (title, quick actions label, message text).

Add an extensible navigation/deep-link hook system that current and future pages/features can register with, so the Secretary chatbot can direct the user to the correct page/feature when invoked (including from menu option selection and free-text routing).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update hero section with a real-life image representing community collaboration/efficiency and refine overlay for improved visibility/readability (including headline/layout/button polish).
Add extensible navigation/deep-link hooks across current and future pages/features so the chatbot secretary can direct users to the correct page/feature when invoked.

projectName: Refine hero visual treatment and add extensible navigation hooks for the Secretary chatbot
